bugs: [Enhancement] - You can now initialize cards on the fly. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/214)
[Bug] - Update to the easy feature builder, since some of the backend has changed. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/213)
[Bug] - Empty email settings password is now truely empty, and you can now clear out email information. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/209)
Documentation. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/199)
[Enhancement] - Added error codes to AJAX responses determined by Exception codes. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/206)
[Bug] - Turned asynchronization on for AJAX by default. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/207)

[Enhancement] - Updated card notifications to update instead of create new, along with changes to button styling [Notification GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/205) [Styling GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/208)
[Feature] - Added functionality to reset your account password. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/181)

[Enhancement] - Added the link area location to the navigation list and formatted the text to stop wrapping, but now on hover show the complete URL. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/197)
[Bug] - Fix to an issue where links weren't respecting their weight. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/196)
[Bug] - Fixed an issue with the admin windows on page load being gigantic and silly. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/195)
[Bug] - Fixed an issue when uploading a single media file would list it (and upload it) twice.
[Bug] - Styling was broken on the listing for media items in browsers other than Chrome :( [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/194)
[Bug] - Admin panel was loading before the stylesheet was, making it look bad on page loads from slow servers. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/191)
[Bug] - Pages that have 'Everyone' in their permissible groups can now be accessed by everyone. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/192)
[Feature] - Pages and feature files can now be requested as JSON. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/183)
[Enhancement] - Links created in the Navigation manager can now support the 'title' and 'target' attributes. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/116)
[Feature] - You can now set the permalink for pages instead of having it automatically generated. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/115)
[Bug] - Fixed a navigation issue when creating a new link. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/177)
[Bug] - Fixed the issue where you couldn't click on anything after turning the page in the accounts feature. - [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/93)
[Bug] - Administrators can now create groups with any set of permissions. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/136)
[Bug] - Fixed a function call in the Media feature. Was trying to log to a function that doesn't exist. Now logs as 'system'. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/148)
[Enhancement] - Updated the refresh rate of admin windows resizing. Should be less noticable now. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/176)
[Bug] - Fixed the admin panel opening on page load when it shouldn't have been. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/175)
[Bug] - Clicking on the Theamus 't' now opens the 'About Theamus' window, even if the admin panel is hidden. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/174)
[Bug] - Fixed the styling of the 'About Theamus' admin window. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/173)
[Bug] - Applied static width and height to the Theamus 't' in the admin panel. Should be better for slower servers now. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/165)
[Enhancement] - Card collapsible updates. You can how create selectable lists in a card! [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/169)
[Feature] - Show page load information like time and query count! [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/153)
